name: LA Times Mini
description: A daily mini crossword from the Los Angeles Times.

name: LA Times Wordflower
description: Find words using the letters in the flower, always using the center letter.

name: LA Times Jigsaw
description: A daily jigsaw puzzle from the Los Angeles Times.

name: Wridges
description: Race the clock by spelling words in the hex grid starting from the bottom row.

name: Pimantle
description: Guess words to see how close they are to the secret word on a graph, and see where others are guessing as well!

name: R6dle
description: A collection of daily guessing games related to Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege.

name: Hexle
description: Guess the secret color by its 6-digit hex code.

name: Weakdle
description: Guess the Pokemon type based on its weaknesses to the attacking types.

name: Pikadoku
description: Fill out the grid with Pokémon matching the criteria of each cell's row and column. More complex than Pokedoku.

name: Weakdoku
description: Fill out the grid with Pokémon based on the weaknesses described in each cell's row and column.

name: Elemingle
description: Guess today's element by swiping cards left, right or up.

name: Forgeous
description: Try to copy famous paintings as close as you can in 3 minutes!

name: Zeldle
description: A collection of daily games related to Zelda.

name: Pokerating
description: Guess an unknown Pokemon based on its in game information and how popular it is, using the ratings of other people.

name: Cobble
description: Come up with two words that use up all of the given letters. The shorter the words, the better!

name: Daily Crypticle
description: Daily cryptic puzzle in the style of Wordle. You have 3 guesses.

name: Traindle
description: Chain together words to form familiar phrases. Timed based word game.

name: Hoopgrids
description: A daily NBA grid game.

name: Avatardle
description: A daily guessing game based on the cartoon show Avatar: The Last Airbender with 3 modes.

name: Sortwise
description: Drag to sort times of events and counts of things in a row

name: Tally Game
description: Partition the board of numbers such that each group sums to 10.

name: Mathlegame
description: Guess an the secret math equation.

name: Reversle
description: Basically the reverse of Wordle. You start with the solution and walk backwards.

name: Leetle
description: Daily programming problem in the style of LeetCode.

name: Ace Attorneydle
description: A collection of daily games related to Ace Attorney.

name: Pokegrid
description: quess the combination of attributes of pokemon in a grid

name: Jeopardy
description: Weekday jeopardy game where you answer 12 multiple choice questions.

name: Wardle
description: A collection of daily games related to War Thunder

name: Framedle
description: Guess the Warframe of the day.

name: Steamdle
description: Guess the Steam game with hints each level based on Release Date, Reviews, and more.

name: Raindle
description: Guess the Risk of Rain 2 item.

name: Tescodle-FLAGGED
description: Guess the price of today's Tesco product.

name: Parlorbox
description: Logic puzzle game based on the Parlor room puzzle from Blue Prince

name: Etyle
description: Guess the root words of the daily word. A game about Etymology.

name: Mcbirdle
description: Professional disc golfer guessing game.

name: Blockle
description: A daily puzzle game that combines Wordle and Tetris

name: Supervivedle
description: A collection of daily games related to Supervive.

name: Sortdle
description: Sort letters into tubes to form the hidden words without running out of moves.

name: Eater of Wordles
description: Guess today's secret Terraria NPC.

name: Clasherdle
description: A daily guessing game for Clash Royale.

name: Keyboard Lines
description: Determine the mystery word just by following the swipe line on the keyboard.

name: Flashpoptiles
description: Traverse the grid while changing either shape or color, never both!

name: Anidle
description: Guess the Anime by its specifications.

name: Nibble-FLAGGED
description: A daily logic puzzle with a touch of learning and trivia

name: Futbol 11
description: A collection of daily games related to Soccer (FÃºtbol).

name: HOTSdle
description: Guess the daily hero from Heroes of the Storm.

name: Omiword
description: Form 4 common words by arranging letter tiles that are locked to different regions of the grid.

name: Treasure Guessr
description: Narrow down a location on the world map.

name: Mcdle
description: A collection of daily games related to Minecraft.

name: Dailyanalogy
description: Guess 5 analogies each day from different categories.

name: Posterdle
description: Guess the movie poster in 20 seconds or less.

name: Stars
description: Distribute stars strategically across the grid without letting them touch.

name: Fields
description: Fill the grid with colorful fields that never connect.

name: Wowdle
description: A collection of daily games related to World of Warcraft.

name: Knotilus
description: Solve this daily puzzle by finding Fibonacci-like sequences from the given numbers.

name: Totem Words
description: Guess the words associated their emoji category, then slide those words to solve the vertical category.

name: Wordspan
description: Guess the 5-letter word based on where adjacent letters relatively appear in the alphabet.
